(mindless-units-immune [mind])
 
(Armor Negating [armornegating], Soul Slaying [soulslaying], Magic Resistance Negates [mrnegates], No Effect on Mindless [mind], Magic weapon [magic], Strength not added to damage [nostr])

Requires 15W10S to forge (W3S2)

Anyone struck by this trident will risk having his soul torn to pieces, so even the smallest scratch from this weapon can be deadly. Mindless units are immune to its soul-shredding effect.
